summary: Two strangers research a mysterious outbreak of mass hysteria in a small village.
cast: Jonathan Bennett|Ali Faulkner|Richard Riehle|Stelio Savante|Tobi Gadison|Karin Duseva|Kef Lee|Gerard Rem|Darleen Zradi|Patrick Muraca|Olivia Marchione|Jason B. Whittier|Miriam Weisbecker|Randy Cormier|Lisa Mears|Alexa Green|Meshell Bordeleau|Linda White|John W Bard|William Taylor|Hana Kenny|Adrianne Balcom|Mike Doraby|Matt Jade|Patrick Welsh
director: Director: Swamy M. Kandan (as Swamy Kandan)
title: The Secret Village
